original_text: And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went to make war with the remnant of her seed, which keep the commandments of God, and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 용이 여자에게 분노하여 돌아가서 그 여자의 남은 자손 곧 하나님의 계명을 지키며 예수의 증거를 가진 자들과 더불어 싸우려고 바다 모래 위에 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the dragon was wroth with the woman
and went to make war with the remnant of her seed
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 자손의 남은 자들과 전쟁을 하러 갔으며

sentences.original_text: which keep the commandments of God
and have the testimony of Jesus Christ
